Perivascular epithelioid cell tumors (PEComas)     Treatment of perivascular epithelioid cell tumors may include the following:               -  Surgery to remove the tumor.      -  Observation followed by surgery.      -  Targeted therapy (mTOR inhibitor), for tumors that have certain gene changes
